properties.areaDesc: Idaho Palouse; Washington Palouse; Coeur d'Alene Area
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 4 at 10:09AM PST until February 5 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Active Winter Weather Returns to the Area...

.A Pacific storm system will bring snow to all elevations of the
region beginning Tuesday afternoon and continuing into Wednesday.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to
10 inches.

* WHERE...Coeur d'Alene, Post Falls, Hayden, Worley, Moscow,
Plummer, Potlatch, and Genesee.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to noon PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday afternoon and
especially the Wednesday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will start late this afternoon
and increase in intensity after midnight. The heaviest snow
will fall Wednesday morning.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST WEDNESDAY
